overview: A beautiful bevy of ravishing coeds who share a room -and each other- for the duration of their educational year.  But the sizzling action doesn´t end when summer vacation begins. It just gets hotter! For the voluptous vixens plan to compete with each other for the steamiest summer on record. And you can be sure that they will "go to any lengts" with any man to win!
title: Gefährlicher Sex frühreifer Mädchen
